resources.string: Address: 675 Belleville St, Victoria, Opening Times: 10AM-5PM Mon-Sun About: Royal British Columbia Museum consists of The Province of British Columbia's natural and human history.
Address:Inner-Harbour PathwayVictoria, BC, Canada Opening Times: 12AM-12AM Mon-Sun About: Victoria Harbour is a harbour, seaport, and seaplane airport.

Address: The BreakwaterVictoria, BC Opening Times: 12AM-12AM Mon-Sun About: The Ogden Point Breakwater is a popular walk near downtown Victoria that follows the cement structure from Dallas Road

Address: 818 Douglas St, Victoria, BC Opening Times: 11-9 About: Southeast Asian street food, made fresh for westcoast tastes.

Address:1234 Wharf St, Victoria, BC Opening Times: 8:30AM–7PM About: Viewing of residential and transients Orca pods, migrating Humpback Whales, Grey Whales and other marine animals that reside in our coastal waters.
Address:812 Wharf St, Victoria, BC Opening Times: 7AM–11PM About: Prince of Whales Whale Watching is the largest, safest and most reliable whale watching company with departures from Victoria, BC
